Articles.Content:
My second F-22. This time I have used mods.

To compare it's unmodded F-22

Mods used:

B9 Aerospace pack http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-20-2-b9-aerospace-pack-r3-1

Procedural Dynamics - Procedural Wing 0.5 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29862-0-21-Procedural-Dynamics-Procedural-Wing-0-5

*Note: It's my first modded craft, so if you see any other mods there, then tell me.

Edit:

I didn't notice bad shape of main wing. I made good shape before. It had to be edited by mistake. Now it looks more like F-22

(I don't change rest of images)

(link updated)

Download link: http://www.sendspace.pl/file/758fa32649c4c5b3dddbd5b

Edited August 23, 2013 by Mareczex333
Updating craft
Looks nice! Very effective use of P-Wings!
In my opinion the stock version looks just as good. But nice job.

Pretty awesome replica. But aren't the wing a bit too far back? I imagine aerodynamics and all those wing panels at the front have something to do with that...

Rune. Always has to find something bad to comment on, even when he likes the ship. Sorry ^^'

I just happened to have a plastic model of this plan sitting at my desk. Holding it up to the screen in comparison shows that your plane is extremely accurate right down to the distance between the wings.

This leaves me to think, why hasn't Squad ever thought of "bubble" canopies? Would look great on ALL planes!

Great Work too! Best.

I just happened to have a plastic model of this plan sitting at my desk. Holding it up to the screen in comparison shows that your plane is extremely accurate right down to the distance between the wings.

Is it a Smithsonian kit?
